name: Build thesis PDFs

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:

jobs:
  build-main:
    name: Build main.pdf
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # Cache TeXLive to speed up subsequent runs (optional but nice)
      - uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: ~/.texlive
          key: texlive-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('**/*.tex', '**/*.bib') }}
          restore-keys: |
            texlive-${{ runner.os }}-

      - name: LaTeX build (main)
        uses: xu-cheng/latex-action@v3
        with:
          root_file: main.tex
          latexmk_use_lualatex: false
          latexmk_shell_escape: true
          # biblatex/biber is auto-detected; you don't need to set anything else.

      - name: Upload main.pdf
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: main-${{ github.sha }}
          path: main.pdf

  build-packs:
    name: Build source packs
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        pack:
          - tools/pack-frontmatter.tex
          - tools/pack-ch12.tex
          - tools/pack-ch34.tex
          - tools/pack-ch56.tex
          - tools/pack-appendix.tex
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: ~/.texlive
          key: texlive-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('**/*.tex', '**/*.bib') }}
          restore-keys: |
            texlive-${{ runner.os }}-

      - name: LaTeX build (${{ matrix.pack }})
        uses: xu-cheng/latex-action@v3
        with:
          root_file: ${{ matrix.pack }}
          latexmk_use_lualatex: false
          latexmk_shell_escape: true

      - name: Upload pack PDF
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: ${{ matrix.pack }}-${{ github.sha }}
          path: tools/*.pdf
